sense.name: set in from the margin
sense.examples: Shift Tab simply indented the paragraph more. Have you indented the paragraph? You had manually indented the paragraph with a tab. You will notice that I indented the paragraph, and it is double-spaced. Word 2007 can automatically indent the first line of every paragraph. To indent the first line of a paragraph, click in front of the line.

sense.name: make the edge jagged
sense.examples: He indented it so the sharp edges are quite noticable.

sense.name: dent, make a depression
sense.examples: Then she indented a dot in the middle of the circle. She indented the tender bark of cottonwood shoots. Kara gave her clay heart that she indented her handprint into. Usually, he indented the body with his fingers

sense.name: bind (as if) by indentures
sense.examples: She indented herself until she was 35, and indentured her children. Disguising himself as a houseboy, he indented himself to a rich family. He indented himself for seven years to Henry Trafford of Liverpool. He indented himself to a sea-captain for seven years.
